inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: peak aortic valve jet velocity of 3.0 - 4.5 m/s, mean pressure gradient of 25 - 49 mmHg, or aortic valve area of 0.76 - 1.5 cm2

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Stationary or minimum dyspnea on exertion (NYHA Fc ≤ I or II)

inclusion.criterion: SBP 120-140 mmHg with or without medication
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who were prescribed ACEI or ARBs for treatment of hypertension will be enrolled after 2 weeks wash-out period
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient agrees to the study protocol and the schedule of clinical, cardiopulmonary exercise test, and echocardiographic follow-up, and provides informed, written consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Symptomatic aortic stenosis: presence of exertional dyspnea (≥ NYHA Fc III), angina or syncope
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Very severe aortic stenosis regardless of presence of symptoms
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled HTN (SBP > 160 or DBP >100) without ACEI or ARBs during 2-weeks wash out period in patients who were prescribed ACEI or ARBs for treatment of hypertension
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known history of coronary artery disease including myocardial infarction, regardless of the treatment (medication only, percutaneous coronary intervention, or coronary artery bypass grafting)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Planned cardiac surgery or planned major non-cardiac surgery within the study period
exclusion.label: unknown
